hero.name: Karine Brito
hero.description_resume: Focused on building high-quality digital interfaces.
hero.description_complete: Hi, I'm Karine, a Front-end Developer with over 2 years' experience and a degree in Systems Analysis and Development. My main goal is to create intuitive and accessible user-centered interfaces. My interest in software development began in 2020, when I decided to understand the workings behind websites. Because of this, I discovered that I can make other people's experiences more intuitive.
hero.startup_1: I started my professional career at Weetravel, a
hero.startup_3: in the tourism sector, where I had the opportunity to develop web systems using technologies such as React and TypeScript.
hero.company_1: Slater, I joined the Front-end team at Equals, a
hero.company_3: of the Stone.Co group, which specializes in financial management and reconciliation. There, I honed my technical and interpersonal skills, working with various technologies such as React, React Native and Java Server Pages.
hero.company_4: Collaborating in a multidisciplinary and agile environment allowed me to develop not only my technical skills, but also my teamwork skills and knowledge of the financial market.
hero.focus: I'm currently focused on studying and developing more accessible and inclusive products. I firmly believe in the power of technology to transform lives and am committed to contributing to a fairer and more empathetic digital world.

experience.developer_equals: Front-end Developer | Equals - Gest√£o Financeira Inteligente
experience.description_equals: Responsible for the maintenance and technology migration of a web platform for reconciling sales with credit, debit cards, bank slips and other online payment methods, with the aim of providing practical and intuitive access to the user.
experience.description_weetravel: Responsible for creating and maintaining a web platform for travel agencies, with the aim of offering better internal control management for agencies and automating agents' daily lives.
